Uses of Package
spoon.pattern

  • Packages that use spoon.pattern 
    Package Description
    spoon.pattern  
    spoon.pattern.internal  
    spoon.pattern.internal.matcher  
    spoon.pattern.internal.node  
    spoon.pattern.internal.parameter  
    spoon.template
    This package defines a framework for well-typed pure-Java templates.
  • Classes in spoon.pattern used by spoon.pattern 
    Class and Description
    ConflictResolutionMode
    Defines what happens when a RootNode has to be replaced by another RootNode, default in ConflictResolutionMode.FAIL.
    Generator
    Generates code from patterns.
    InlinedStatementConfigurator
    Builds inline statements of Pattern For example if the `for` statement in this pattern model
    Match
    Represents a single match of Pattern
    Pattern
    Represents a pattern for matching code.
    PatternBuilder
    The master class to create a Pattern instance.
    PatternBuilderHelper
    Utility class to select parts of AST to be used as a model of a PatternBuilder.
    PatternParameterConfigurator
    Used to define pattern parameters.
    PatternParameterConfigurator.ParameterElementPair 
    Quantifier
    Defines a matching strategy for pattern parameters, default is Quantifier.GREEDY.
  • Classes in spoon.pattern used by spoon.pattern.internal 
    Class and Description
    Generator
    Generates code from patterns.
  • Classes in spoon.pattern used by spoon.pattern.internal.matcher

    Represents a single match of Pattern
  • Classes in spoon.pattern used by spoon.pattern.internal.node

  • Classes in spoon.pattern used by spoon.pattern.internal.parameter
